on reading compounds: 遊撃【ユウゲキ】raid, military attack by a mobile unit, hit-and-run attack, search-and-kill mission, search-and-destroy mission, military action without a predetermined target, attacking the enemy or assisting allies as the opportunity arises, shortstop, short

遊撃【ユウゲキ】raid, military attack by a mobile unit, hit-and-run attack, search-and-kill mission, search-and-destroy mission, military action without a predetermined target, attacking the enemy or assisting allies as the opportunity arises, shortstop, short

kun reading compounds: 遊ぶ【あそぶ】to play, to enjoy oneself, to have a good time, to mess about (with alcohol, gambling, philandery, etc.), to be idle, to do nothing, to be unused, to go to (for pleasure or for study), to intentionally throw a ball to lower the batter's concentration
遊ぶ金欲しさ【あそぶかねほしさ】desire for money for one's enjoyment (as an alleged motive for theft, fraud, etc.)
遊ばす【あそばす】to let (someone) play, to keep (someone) amused, to entertain, to leave idle, to not make use of, to let go to waste, to do, to do
